Data Science In Practice

This document provides a summary of the Datanest Analytics Catalog, highlighting the current state of data and offering solutions for bridging data silos, leveraging AI and Machine Learning, and providing actionable insights. The catalog also introduces Data-Science as a Service, including DS as a Service, ML Products, and Data Exploration.

Key Concepts:

  • Data Science In Practice
  • Leveraging Data for Business Growth
  • Bridging Data Silos
  • AI and Machine Learning in Business
  • Data Exploration and Validation
